TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: The authorization token could not be found.
NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to access this resource.
USERNAME_EMAIL_EXISTS: A user with the same email and username already exists.
USERNAME_EXISTS: A user with the same username already exists.
EMAIL_EXISTS: A user with the same email already exists.
INVALID_PASSWORD: The password cannot be less than 8 characters.
INVALID_EMAIL: You must enter a valid email.
INVALID_PHONE: You must enter a valid phone number.
INVALID_EMAIL_PHONE: You must enter a valid email or phone number.
